objective: Analyze AWS CloudWatch metrics to identify underutilized resources and generate cost optimization recommendations
steps: - Query CloudWatch metrics to collect EC2 CPU and memory utilization data
- Analyze RDS performance metrics including CPU, connections, and IOPS
- Identify resources with utilization below defined thresholds
- Calculate potential cost savings from rightsizing or terminating underutilized resources
- Generate optimization recommendations for each underutilized resource
- Compile findings into actionable AWS cost optimization report
- Send summary notification via Slack for immediate review
guardrails: - Define utilization thresholds: EC2 CPU < 20%, RDS CPU < 30%
- Include specific details for each resource: Instance Type, Utilization %, Daily Cost, Recommendation, Potential Savings
- Focus on resources with minimum cost threshold above $10/day
